name: Rabbit Rampage on The Great CarRoot
name_original: Rabbit Rampage on The Great CarRoot
description:
Hi this Game was made for the GGJ2023 with the theme ROOTS.

So we decided to create a strategy wave game that you need to break blocks to upgrade your army.

And reach all 3 upgrades so you can break the Bedrock and end the game.

The Controls are : 

W key / Up Arrow key -> Move Camera Up 

S key / Down Arrow key -> Move Camera Down 

Left Mouse Button -> Break Blocks

Credits

Art:

  • Beatriz Azevedo

Programming:

  • João Pamplona
  • Rodrigo Gomes
  • Carlos Marque

We are part of a youth association in which our members are university students and if you're interested in playing more games from us or our game dev association be sure to follow Game Dev Tecnico at their itch.io!

Itch.io - gamedevtecnico.itch.io
